title: Zeit Want My TDZ 5/9: Hacked, Kendrick Lamaar, Avatar, Disney, Nikola Jokic, John Brown, HODL
itunes:title: Zeit Want My TDZ 5/9: Hacked, Kendrick Lamaar, Avatar, Disney, Nikola Jokic, John Brown, HODL
description:
In this edition of Zeit Want My TDZ, Jack and Miles discuss Russian TV getting hacked with anti-war messages on V-Day, the new Kendrick Lamaar video, the 'Avatar: The Way Of Water' trailer, Nazi flags flying at Disneyworld, Nikola Jokic winning MVP for second straight season, abolitionist John Brown's birthday, protesters pulling up at Brett Kavanaugh's house, and a crypto-dip for all the HODLers!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
